timeline.bodyText: We talked about the unreliable instanceof check in the past, it would be great to find a reliable solution, but for now I've just typed the prop as an object, like we do it in many other places.
timeline.author: linuspahl

timeline.message: Remove instanceOf(View) for ViewActionsMenu prop because it is not working properly
Remove instanceOf(View) for ViewActionsMenu prop because it is not working properly
Use pure function instead of class for EntityListItem
